metadata.title: CVE-2016-7117 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in the __sys_recvmmsg function in net/socket.cin the Linux kernel before 4.5.2 allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code via vectors involving a recvmmsg system call that ismishandled during error processing.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7117` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-22-generic - 4.4.0-22.39
